name: Lime Invador
description:
For this Game Jam, our team made up of 2 game programmers had to create a game based on the "lime" theme and we decided to go for a FPS.

To protect your loved ones from the invasion, you take up arms and use enemy technology to counter them. We fight fire with fire, don't we?
Arm yourself with limes weapons and eradicate the enemy threat.

Direction Arrows or WASD : Move your character

Mouse movements : Rotate your character

Space : Jump

Left-click : Shoot with your current weapon

Right-click : Aim

R : Reload your charger

Game made in a week by 2 students from the IIM school.

Hugo Tuil - Game Programmer

Loïc Gombauld - Game Programmer
